props.clickHandler()} className="cardboard">




{t('appPageTexts.part7')}

BiblioPDF is a React/Java web application for handling electronic bibliographic materials, as papers, books, even code.

The frontend will be developed using REACT and the backend will ultimately be a REST based API implemented with some flavor of Spring and Spring-JPA on PostgreSQL.

The development process is based on Gitlab (free tier).

It is intended that the deploy will be made in a cloud service (AWS or other) or cloud-like (if you like) as Docker on a traditional provider like Digital Ocean.

Although this app should be useful, it will mostly serve as a technology demonstration.

The project is being conducted by Jorge L.S. Le√£o (sole for the moment).

It started on january 27th, 2022. It has not yet produced a working version nor been deployed.
); }
